verses.verse: הָיְתָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become עָלַי֮ <S%H5921><s%> and יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> The hand יְהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיּוֹצִאֵ֤נִי <S%H3318><s%> was upon me and carried me out בְר֙וּחַ֙ <S%H7307><s%> in the spirit יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיְנִיחֵ֖נִי <S%H5117><s%> and set me down בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst הַבִּקְעָ֑ה <S%H1237><s%> of the valley וְהִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> and it was מְלֵאָ֥ה <S%H4392><s%> which [was] full עֲצָמֽוֹת׃ <S%H6106><s%> of bones

וְהֶעֱבִירַ֥נִי <S%H5674><s%> And caused me to pass עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> among סָבִ֣יב ׀ <S%H5439><s%> by them round about סָבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> about וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold רַבּ֤וֹת <S%H7227><s%> many מְאֹד֙ <S%H3966><s%> and behold [there were] very עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> among פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> in the open הַבִּקְעָ֔ה <S%H1237><s%> valley וְהִנֵּ֖ה <S%H2009><s%> and lo יְבֵשׁ֥וֹת <S%H3002><s%> dry מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> and lo [they were] very

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> unto me Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man הֲתִחְיֶ֖ינָה <S%H2421><s%> live הָעֲצָמ֣וֹת <S%H6106><s%> can these bones הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וָאֹמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> ? And I answered אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> O Lord יְהוִ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> You יָדָֽעְתָּ׃ <S%H3045><s%> thou knowest

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Again he said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me הִנָּבֵ֖א <S%H5012><s%> unto me Prophesy עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הָעֲצָמ֣וֹת <S%H6106><s%> upon these bones הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> and say אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about הָעֲצָמוֹת֙ <S%H6106><s%> bones הַיְבֵשׁ֔וֹת <S%H3002><s%> unto them O ye dry שִׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> hear דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> the word יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD לָעֲצָמ֖וֹת <S%H6106><s%> unto these bones הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> to these הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֲנִ֜י <S%H589><s%> I מֵבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> to enter בָכֶ֛ם ר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Behold I will cause breath וִחְיִיתֶֽם׃ <S%H2421><s%> into you and ye shall live

וְנָתַתִּי֩ <S%H5414><s%> And I will lay עֲלֵיכֶ֨ם <S%H5921><s%> and גִּדִ֜ים <S%H1517><s%> sinews וְֽהַעֲלֵתִ֧י <S%H5927><s%> upon you and will bring up עֲלֵיכֶ֣ם <S%H5921><s%> on בָּשָׂ֗ר <S%H1320><s%> flesh וְקָרַמְתִּ֤י <S%H7159><s%> upon you and cover עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> with ע֔וֹר <S%H5785><s%> you with skin וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> and put בָכֶ֛ם ר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> breath וִחְיִיתֶ֑ם <S%H2421><s%> in you and ye shall live וִידַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD

וְנִבֵּ֖אתִי <S%H5012><s%> So I prophesied כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> I צֻוֵּ֑יתִי <S%H6680><s%> as I was commanded וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> there was ק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> there was a noise כְּהִנָּֽבְאִי֙ <S%H5012><s%> and as I prophesied וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> and behold רַ֔עַשׁ <S%H7494><s%> and behold a shaking וַתִּקְרְב֣וּ <S%H7126><s%> came together עֲצָמ֔וֹת <S%H6106><s%> and the bones עֶ֖צֶם <S%H6106><s%> bone אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עַצְמֽוֹ׃ <S%H6106><s%> to his bone

וְרָאִ֜יתִי <S%H7200><s%> And when I beheld וְהִנֵּֽה־ <S%H2009><s%> and behold עֲלֵיהֶ֤ם <S%H5921><s%> and גִּדִים֙ <S%H1517><s%> lo the sinews וּבָשָׂ֣ר <S%H1320><s%> and the flesh עָלָ֔ה <S%H5927><s%> came up וַיִּקְרַ֧ם <S%H7159><s%> covered עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H5921><s%> and ע֖וֹר <S%H5785><s%> upon them and the skin מִלְמָ֑עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> them above וְר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> but [there was] no breath אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there בָּהֶֽם׃

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me הִנָּבֵ֖א <S%H5012><s%> he unto me Prophesy אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָר֑וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> unto the wind הִנָּבֵ֣א <S%H5012><s%> prophesy בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> son אָ֠דָם <S%H120><s%> of man וְאָמַרְתָּ֨ <S%H559><s%> and say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָר֜וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> to the wind כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> GOD מֵאַרְבַּ֤ע <S%H702><s%> from the four רוּחוֹת֙ <S%H7307><s%> winds בֹּ֣אִי <S%H935><s%> Come הָר֔וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> O breath וּפְחִ֛י <S%H5301><s%> and breathe בַּהֲרוּגִ֥ים <S%H2026><s%> upon these slain הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וְיִֽחְיֽוּ׃ <S%H2421><s%> that they may live

וְהִנַּבֵּ֖אתִי <S%H5012><s%> So I prophesied כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> he צִוָּ֑נִי <S%H6680><s%> as he commanded וַתָּבוֹא֩ <S%H935><s%> came בָהֶ֨ם הָר֜וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> me and the breath וַיִּֽחְי֗וּ <S%H2421><s%> into them and they lived וַיַּֽעַמְדוּ֙ <S%H5975><s%> and stood up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רַגְלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H7272><s%> upon their feet חַ֖יִל <S%H2428><s%> army גָּד֥וֹל <S%H1419><s%> great מְאֹד־ <S%H3966><s%> an exceedingly מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> an exceedingly ס

וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <S%H559><s%> Then he said אֵלַי֒ <S%H413><s%> to me בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> unto me Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man הָעֲצָמ֣וֹת <S%H6106><s%> these bones הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> are the whole בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> are the whole house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הֵ֑מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> behold אֹמְרִ֗ים <S%H559><s%> behold they say יָבְשׁ֧וּ <S%H3001><s%> are dried עַצְמוֹתֵ֛ינוּ <S%H6106><s%> Our bones וְאָבְדָ֥ה <S%H6><s%> is lost תִקְוָתֵ֖נוּ <S%H8615><s%> and our hope נִגְזַ֥רְנוּ <S%H1504><s%> we are cut off לָֽנוּ׃

לָכֵן֩ <S%H3651><s%> Therefore הִנָּבֵ֨א <S%H5012><s%> Therefore prophesy וְאָמַרְתָּ֜ <S%H559><s%> and say אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> to כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֮ <S%H559><s%> unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <S%H3069><s%> GOD הִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֲנִ֨י <S%H589><s%> I פֹתֵ֜חַ <S%H6605><s%> I will open אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קִבְרֽוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H6913><s%> your graves וְהַעֲלֵיתִ֥י <S%H5927><s%> and cause you to come up אֶתְכֶ֛ם <S%H853><s%> מִקִּבְרוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H6913><s%> out of your graves עַמִּ֑י <S%H5971><s%> Behold O my people וְהֵבֵאתִ֥י <S%H935><s%> and bring אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into אַדְמַ֥ת <S%H127><s%> you into the land יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ס

וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> And ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD בְּפִתְחִ֣י <S%H6605><s%> when I have opened אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קִבְרֽוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H6913><s%> your graves וּבְהַעֲלוֹתִ֥י <S%H5927><s%> and brought you up אֶתְכֶ֛ם <S%H853><s%> מִקִּבְרוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H6913><s%> out of your graves עַמִּֽי׃ <S%H5971><s%> O my people

וְנָתַתִּ֨י <S%H5414><s%> And shall put רוּחִ֤י <S%H7307><s%> my spirit בָכֶם֙ וִחְיִיתֶ֔ם <S%H2421><s%> in you and ye shall live וְהִנַּחְתִּ֥י <S%H3240><s%> and I shall place אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and אַדְמַתְכֶ֑ם <S%H127><s%> you in your own land וִידַעְתֶּ֞ם <S%H3045><s%> then shall ye know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֧י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> that I the LORD דִּבַּ֥רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> have spoken וְעָשִׂ֖יתִי <S%H6213><s%> [it] and performed נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> [it] saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD פ
וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> The word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came again unto me saying

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> and you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> Moreover thou son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of man קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> take לְךָ֙ עֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> stick אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> thee one וּכְתֹ֤ב <S%H3789><s%> and write עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> on לִֽיהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> upon it For Judah וְלִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> and for the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel [חֲבֵרֹו כ] (חֲבֵרָ֑יו <S%H2270><s%> companion ק) וּלְקַח֙ <S%H3947><s%> then take עֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> stick אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> another וּכְת֣וֹב <S%H3789><s%> and write עָלָ֗יו <S%H5921><s%> on לְיוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> upon it For Joseph עֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> the stick אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> and [for] all the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel [חֲבֵרֹו כ] (חֲבֵרָֽיו׃ <S%H2270><s%> companion ק)

וְקָרַ֨ב <S%H7126><s%> And join אֹתָ֜ם <S%H853><s%> אֶחָ֧ד <S%H259><s%> them one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶחָ֛ד <S%H259><s%> to another לְךָ֖ לְעֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> stick אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> into one וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> may become לַאֲחָדִ֖ים <S%H259><s%> and they shall become one בְּיָדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3027><s%> in thine hand

וְכַֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> after יֹאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> shall speak אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> about בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> And when the children עַמְּךָ֖ <S%H5971><s%> of thy people לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> unto thee saying הֲלֽוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תַגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> Wilt thou not shew לָ֖נוּ מָה־ <S%H4100><s%> what אֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> another לָּֽךְ׃

דַּבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> Say אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> to כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֮ <S%H559><s%> unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <S%H3069><s%> GOD הִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֲנִ֨י <S%H589><s%> I לֹקֵ֜חַ <S%H3947><s%> Behold I will take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵ֤ץ <S%H6086><s%> the stick יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> which [is] in the hand אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim וְשִׁבְטֵ֥י <S%H7626><s%> and the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel [חֶבְרֹו כ] (חֲבֵרָ֑יו <S%H2270><s%> companion ק) וְנָתַתִּי֩ <S%H5414><s%> and will put אוֹתָ֨ם <S%H853><s%> עָלָ֜יו <S%H5921><s%> and אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for עֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> them with him [even] with the stick יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וַֽעֲשִׂיתִם֙ <S%H6213><s%> and make לְעֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> stick אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> them one וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> and they shall be one בְּיָדִֽי׃ <S%H3027><s%> in mine hand

וְהָי֨וּ <S%H1961><s%> become הָעֵצִ֜ים <S%H6086><s%> And the sticks אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which תִּכְתֹּ֧ב <S%H3789><s%> whereon thou writest עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H5921><s%> will be in בְּיָדְךָ֖ <S%H3027><s%> shall be in thine hand לְעֵינֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5869><s%> before their eyes

וְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> And say אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> to כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֮ <S%H559><s%> unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <S%H3069><s%> GOD הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I לֹקֵ֙חַ֙ <S%H3947><s%> Behold I will take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִבֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> from among הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> the heathen אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> they הָֽלְכוּ־ <S%H1980><s%> whither they be gone שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> and I וְקִבַּצְתִּ֤י <S%H6908><s%> and will gather אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> מִסָּבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> them on every side וְהֵבֵאתִ֥י <S%H935><s%> and bring אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into אַדְמָתָֽם׃ <S%H127><s%> them into their own land

וְעָשִׂ֣יתִי <S%H6213><s%> And I will make אֹ֠תָם <S%H853><s%> לְג֨וֹי <S%H1471><s%> nation אֶחָ֤ד <S%H259><s%> them one בָּאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> in the land בְּהָרֵ֣י <S%H2022><s%> upon the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּמֶ֧לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king אֶחָ֛ד <S%H259><s%> and one יִֽהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְכֻלָּ֖ם <S%H3605><s%> for all לְמֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> shall be king וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> will no [יִהְיֶה־ כ] (יִֽהְיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> become עוֹד֙ <S%H1961><s%> become ק) לִשְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> no more two גוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> nations וְלֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> and no יֵחָ֥צוּ <S%H2673><s%> neither shall they be divided ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> to them all and they shall be לִשְׁתֵּ֥י <S%H8147><s%> into two מַמְלָכ֖וֹת <S%H4467><s%> kingdoms עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> longer

וְלֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> will no יִֽטַמְּא֣וּ <S%H2930><s%> Neither shall they defile ע֗וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer בְּגִלּֽוּלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H1544><s%> themselves any more with their idols וּבְשִׁקּ֣וּצֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H8251><s%> nor with their detestable things וּבְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> any פִּשְׁעֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6588><s%> nor with any of their transgressions וְהוֹשַׁעְתִּ֣י <S%H3467><s%> but I will save אֹתָ֗ם <S%H853><s%> מִכֹּ֤ל <S%H3605><s%> all מוֹשְׁבֹֽתֵיהֶם֙ <S%H4186><s%> them out of all their dwellingplaces אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which חָטְא֣וּ <S%H2398><s%> wherein they have sinned בָהֶ֔ם וְטִהַרְתִּ֤י <S%H2891><s%> and will cleanse אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> וְהָיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> become לִ֣י לְעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> them so shall they be my people וַאֲנִ֕י <S%H589><s%> I אֶהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָהֶ֖ם לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> and I will be their God

וְעַבְדִּ֤י <S%H5650><s%> my servant דָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> And David מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [shall be] king עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> over וְרוֹעֶ֥ה <S%H7462><s%> shepherd אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> over them and they all shall have one יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> have לְכֻלָּ֑ם <S%H3605><s%> will all וּבְמִשְׁפָּטַ֣י <S%H4941><s%> in my judgments יֵלֵ֔כוּ <S%H1980><s%> will walk וְחֻקֹּתַ֥י <S%H2708><s%> my statutes יִשְׁמְר֖וּ <S%H8104><s%> and observe וְעָשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> and do אוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְיָשְׁב֣וּ <S%H3427><s%> And they shall dwell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֙תִּי֙ <S%H5414><s%> that I have given לְעַבְדִּ֣י <S%H5650><s%> my servant לְיַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> unto Jacob אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יָֽשְׁבוּ־ <S%H3427><s%> have dwelt בָ֖הּ אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> wherein your fathers וְיָשְׁב֣וּ <S%H3427><s%> and they shall dwell עָלֶ֡יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and הֵ֠מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they וּבְנֵיהֶ֞ם <S%H1121><s%> therein [even] they and their children וּבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> and their children's בְנֵיהֶם֙ <S%H1121><s%> children עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever וְדָוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> David עַבְדִּ֔י <S%H5650><s%> and my servant נָשִׂ֥יא <S%H5387><s%> [shall be] their prince לָהֶ֖ם לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> ever

וְכָרַתִּ֤י <S%H3772><s%> Moreover I will make לָהֶם֙ בְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> a covenant שָׁל֔וֹם <S%H7965><s%> of peace בְּרִ֥ית <S%H1285><s%> covenant עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> with them it shall be an everlasting יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become אוֹתָ֑ם <S%H854><s%> and I וּנְתַתִּים֙ <S%H5414><s%> with them and I will place וְהִרְבֵּיתִ֣י <S%H7235><s%> them and multiply אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וְנָתַתִּ֧י <S%H5414><s%> them and will set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִקְדָּשִׁ֛י <S%H4720><s%> my sanctuary בְּתוֹכָ֖ם <S%H8432><s%> in the midst לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> of them for evermore

וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become מִשְׁכָּנִי֙ <S%H4908><s%> My tabernacle עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> and וְהָיִ֥יתִי <S%H1961><s%> become לָהֶ֖ם לֵֽאלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> also shall be with them yea I will be their God וְהֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like יִֽהְיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> become לִ֥י לְעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> and they shall be my people

וְיָֽדְעוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> shall know הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> And the heathen כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> that I the LORD מְקַדֵּ֖שׁ <S%H6942><s%> do sanctify אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel בִּהְי֧וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become מִקְדָּשִׁ֛י <S%H4720><s%> when my sanctuary בְּתוֹכָ֖ם <S%H8432><s%> shall be in the midst לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> of them for evermore ס
